Features

Resistant against the elements: Never let the elements stop you from getting a quality shot ever again! All of our equipment can stay submerged in water up to 50 feet deep for up to 2 hours and has been tested to function at full capacity in even the most harsh wind and precipitation conditions. Click here for full details and official results from our extensive durability testing.

Long lasting battery: The built-in large capacity batteries in our equipment last up to 96 hours working at full capacity and take only 2 hours to completely recharge for endless capturing. Click here for full details and official results from our battery testing.

Variety of Premier Interchangeable lenses: Every device on our line comes complete with a full set of interchangeable lenses so you can take photographs ranging from detailed close-ups to those in low-light to ranging panoramic shots.
